name: baf
description: Automation framework for mobile and web testing

scripts.clean: rimraf .tsbuild/ && rimraf allure-results/ && rimraf junit-results/ && rimraf poGenerated/ && rimraf reports/0
scripts.start-web: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.chrome.conf.ts
scripts.start-web-docker: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.multi-browser.docker.conf.ts
scripts.start-mobile: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.mobile.conf.ts
scripts.start-mobile-bo: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.mobile.booking.conf.ts
scripts.start-mobile-bs: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.mobile.bs.conf.ts
scripts.start-mobile-sl: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.mobile.sl.conf.ts
scripts.start-web-sl: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.web.sl.conf.ts
scripts.report: npm run clean-report && npm run open-report

author: Carlos Gauto
